item.title: Defense: Paying for The New ‘Hour of Europe’
item.description: The week of March 3, 2025: Funding Europe’s NATO gap, tariffs, industrial policy, the congestion tax, and much, much more.

item.title: Judge Ali Retreats on Foreign Aid, but Constitutional Fight Looms
item.description: The big argument is only just beginning.

item.title: Does Trump Know Why He Was Elected?
item.description: The public wants the economy humming, the border secure, and an end to woke lunacy — not tariffs and irrelevant indulgences.

item.title: These Three GOP Senators Actually Support Workers
item.description: Thank you to Senators Paul, McConnell, and Budd for voting against the worst Republican labor secretary of our lifetime.

item.title: End the Ukraine Intelligence Freeze
item.description: The cutoff is a gift to Russia. A reversal can’t come soon enough.
